entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:40PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels and Ice Jam Potential on Interior Rivers... Spring breakup is picking up speed in the Middle Tanana Valley and across the Interior with the warm temperatures this past week and over the weekend.
